page.title: 10HOTELS
page.content: We are very near Heathrow Airport and 2 of the larger hotels are in our area. We visited one, The Holiday Inn, and were shown around and then taken to a conferance room to interview the Personel Manager. She was very helpful and answered all our questions and gave us drinks and biscuits. The Holiday Inn belongs to the largest accommodation system in the world. It offers free parking, swimming pool, sauna,well appointed rooms with large comfortable beds,colour television and private bathrooms and many other things for guests. We saw a menue, it was full of delicious things. At the reception desk we saw a tariff and it cost Â£48.OO for one night. The hotel also employs many people. They train, clothe and feed their employees while on duty. The wages are good with a bonus and a free holiday.
